#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<string>
unsigned long palin(unsigned long p)
{
	unsigned long t=0;
	while(p>0)
	{
		t = t*10+p%10;
		p=p/10;
	}
	return t;
}
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int n,it,i;
	unsigned long p[100];
	cin>>n;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		cin>>p[i];
	}
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		it = 0;
		
		while(p[i]!=palin(p[i]))
		{
			p[i] = p[i]+palin(p[i]);
			
			it++;
		}
		cout<<it<<" "<<p[i]<<endl;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
